title: RIP-5 | Roadmap item for 2022-Q3 | Regulation Crowdfunding (RegCF) for REtoken DAO LLC
body:
# Overview
Add Roadmap item for 2022-Q3 | Regulation Crowdfunding (RegCF) for REtoken DAO LLC

REtoken Roadmap: [https://trello.com/b/hsSQDrHr](https://trello.com/b/hsSQDrHr)

# Current Beliefs:

* [1] Best path forward for the proliferation of Real Estate Tokenization is with Regulation Crowdfunding SEC securities regulation.  RegCF allows for up to $5M in a single offering
* [2] We are taking additional measures to explore solutions partners with our #tokentown project that are SEC / FINRA registered.  This will allow us to more easily attract capital from all sources with these measures in place.
* [3] @$RETOKEN (our social token) as our "**[Genesis Proposal / $RETOKEN | Token Policy](https://snapshot.org/#/retokendao.eth/proposal/QmdJUQkW6dNWfuT5BZbx1qWzopgbpEFom1xaVsVCQCT7UD)**" states in the 1st line:
> ***$RETOKEN is for fun.***
* [4] When we deliver these Roadmap items ...
> 
> __**2021-Q4**__
> • Win HeroX.com / American-Made Solar Prize Round 5 with #tokentown 
> • Founding Citizen NFT Launch for #tokentown Colorado
> • Meetup.com framework to develop local REtoken "Ambassadors"
> • Whitepaper for REtoken
> • Value added content (LiveStream / Podcast / written articles / eBook / etc)
> 
> __**2022-Q1**__
> • REtoken Virtual Summit for Real Estate Tokenization
> 
> __**2021-Q2**__
> • Certificate Program for Fractionalized Real Estate
* [5] We will have created a community (REtoken DAO LLC) that we can "bring to market" via a RegCF Security Token Offering

# Discord "Temp Check"
[https://discord.com/channels/877883581903564860/882418077004877834/895751229190320150](https://discord.com/channels/877883581903564860/882418077004877834/895751229190320150)

# Vote with emoji
* Yes - This sounds AMAZING!!
* No - keep $RETOKEN "for fun"
author: 0xE1b1aEC67295E36803be239e55e0e3B67AF4fFB4
